segments.pli: “Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako ‘aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo’ti vuccati.
segments.en: “Mendicants, a noble disciple who has four things is said to be rich, affluent, and wealthy.

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
segments.en: It’s when a noble disciple has experiential confidence in the Buddha …

segments.pli: itipi so bhagavā … pe … satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavāti;
ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi … pe … samādhisaṃvattanikehi.
segments.en: And they have the ethical conduct loved by the noble ones … leading to immersion.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako ‘aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo’ti vuccatī”ti.
segments.en: A noble disciple who has these four things is said to be rich, affluent, and wealthy.”

sections.title: “Mendicants, a noble disciple who has four things is…

suttaplex.blurb: A noble disciple with the four factors of stream-entry is said to be prosperous.
